value: most students come to me because they
lack confidence when they're speaking

their life it could be a university or

move to the United States and they're
just not interacting with native
speakers because they're not confident
so there are different ways that you can
approach this you have improving your
skill you know and that that's where I
come in and that's what this core this
course comes in it's not the only way to
increase your confidence but if you get
really good at English you're probably
going to feel more comfortable using it
the other ways are you know you can
change your physiology you know you can
change your posture you can change the
tonality of your voice
you can smile more Americans love to

living in the United States smile more
it's okay the people that get the best
at languages are the people that aren't
afraid to make mistakes and aren't
afraid to be social so the last thing I
want to suggest is that you question the
beliefs that are causing you to have a

cultures where there is a lot of
judgments in the classrooms where you're
learning English what people will make
fun of you if you make a mistake or you
may have a cultural condition belief
that if you don't have a perfect accent
then you sound unintelligent or
unprofessional now this is a process
you're not going to be perfect right

put yourself out there but I can help
